document.ModsDocTitle: First Canadian record of the water mite Thermacarusnevadensis Marshall, 1928 (Arachnida: Acariformes: Hydrachnidiae: Thermacaridae) from hot springs in British Columbia

subSubSection.paragraph: Thermacaridae can be recognized using the keys of Cook (1974) and Walter et al. (2009) . Additional detailed descriptions and images of Thermacarus nevadensis can be found in Marshall (1928) and Baker (1985) .
